Hero image: Joyful members at Bergen Armwrestling posing in front of the camera
Armwrestling origin: Armwrestling goes all the way back to the Olympic Games in Athens. If you want to try armwrestling, you are most welcome to us, regardless of size and gender. Come with the arms you have!
Armwrestling story: Armwrestling is a social and interesting sport, and a match usually lasts between 1 - 2 seconds. Much depends on the athlete's technique, muscle strength and speed. In 1998, the Norwegian Armwrestling Association was incorporated as part of the Norwegian Wrestling Association.
